mapper.sql: ID, PROJECT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, RANKING, PROPORTION, TOTAL_AMOUNT, STATUS, CREATER_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
order by ${orderByClause}

select p.*,t.NAME as productName,i.* from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT p,T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO i, T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT t where p.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId} and p.PROJECT_ID=i.PROJECT_ID and i.SUPPLIER_ID=p.SUPPLIER_ID and t.id=i.PRODUCT_ID
select COUNT(RANKING)as RANKING from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY RANKING,SUPPLIER_ID,PROJECT_ID HAVING COUNT(RANKING)>2

select r.PROJECT_ID,SUPPLIER_ID,r.RANKING,sum(PROPORTION) as PROPORTION, r.TOTAL_AMOUNT, r.STATUS ,r.REMARK from (select DISTINCT r.PROJECT_ID, r.SUPPLIER_ID, r.RANKING, r.PROPORTION, r.TOTAL_AMOUNT, r.STATUS,s.SUPPLIER_NAME as REMARK from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT r LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER s on r.SUPPLIER_ID=s.ID where r.SUPPLIER_ID=s.id and r.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) r GROUP BY r.PROJECT_ID,SUPPLIER_ID,r.RANKING, r.PROPORTION, r.TOTAL_AMOUNT, r.STATUS,r.REMARK ORDER BY r.RANKING
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT (ID, PROJECT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, RANKING, PROPORTION, TOTAL_AMOUNT, STATUS, CREATER_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
RANKING,
PROPORTION,
TOTAL_AMOUNT,
STATUS,
CREATER_ID,
REMARK,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,

mapper.select: select count(*) from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT sum(PROPORTION) as PROPORTION,SUPPLIER_ID from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT WHERE PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=1 and SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY SUPPLIER_ID
select count(DISTINCT SUPPLIER_ID) from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS!=-1
select count(DISTINCT SUPPLIER_ID) from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS=1
select count(DISTINCT SUPPLIER_ID) from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT where PROJECT_ID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROPORTION !=0
mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{record.proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANKING = #{record.ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPORTION = #{record.proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANKING = #{ranking,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(PR.PROPORTION) AS REMARK, PR.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID, PR.SUPPLIER_ID AS SUPPLIER_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_PROJECT_RESULT PR WHERE PR.PROJECT_ID = #{project_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PR.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY PR.PROJECT_ID, PR.SUPPLIER_ID HAVING SUM(PR.PROPORTION) = 0
